entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
